entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
